website_summaries.verdict: With over 300 different stencil shapes, this set really inspires creativity.
pros: All the stencils and supplies fit nicely in a carrying case
Handle on case makes it easy to take places
Stencils are of a nice quality hard plastic
cons: Kids should be a little older to be able to hold the stencils and trace
This set might be a struggle for younger kids

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, excellent company!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this set and company! ❤❤❤ The set is adorable, with pre sharpened pencils, a pen, cute paper, a pencil sharpener, tons of stencils and most importantly, a sturdy case to keep it all securely. My daughter LOVES the set and brings it with her everywhere! We did have an issue with the initial case being cracked in the top corner upon arrival, but the company replaced the whole set most rapidly!!! Can't beat the super fast response and replacement from this company. I will most definitely order from them again....found my go to gift for kids creative outlet!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Miller

customer_reviews.title: Need to be a little bigger.
customer_reviews.text: Tha smaller parts such as ears, legs etc. are often too small to fit the pencil and somewhat frustrating as it is not easy to trace. Nice idea. Nice case but stencils need to be a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter loved these! Hours of fun tracing shapes/ animals etc. The stencils are very well made. They are a hard plastic, so very sturdy. The carrying case is great. Everything fits nicely inside.
customer_reviews.author: Pat DoughertyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them! There are a LOT of stencils to choose from. They are very sturdy and my daughter has a easy time drawing them. From planes, automobiles, boats, planets to dinos, sea creatures, circus themed shapes, farm animals and safari animals. And also shapes, numbers, letters, princesses, ballerinas, flowers, jewelry, high heels, necklaces, brush, purse, flowers and butterflies. Even a Christmas themed one too. They come in a cute briefcase-like holder that has a handle so its easy to take with you. Also comes with paper and colored pencils.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie O.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure who had more fun - the grandkids or me!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas day was chaotic! Too many gifts left the 3 little grandkids almost unable to focus on any one thing. But my 3-year old grandson grabbed my hand and said, " Play with me grandma" and we headed right for the stencils. What a great assortment! Lots of paper. We made all sorts of animals and had so much fun together. Was the little Elf watching us? lol
customer_reviews.author: Zephyr

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I decided to order it because the reviews looks great however when my daughter tried it and she was complaining that the small parts was very difficult to traced . I actually tried it my self and I’m having hard time as well. The parts are so narrowly you’ll just ended up skipping those small area. Not satisfied at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: These stencils have it all!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this before a long road trip as my kids have enjoyed stencils before at other kids' houses and thought this would give them something fun to do in the car. They really enjoyed all the variety and being able to write silly stories to go along with their pictures. I like the case because of the variety--something for girls, for boys--also, it has a sharpener to go along with the colored pencils. Colored pencils were good quality and a good range of colors.
customer_reviews.author: The Fam Five

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift For A Child That Likes To Doodle.
customer_reviews.text: This stencil set is a great gift for any child, but especially those that have trouble concentrating or keeping still. My granddaughter loves them and will drag them out if she is restless or bored. The stencils are made of sturdy plastic but do have a few sharp edges (which is understandable because of some of the angles they have) so may not be good for younger children unless they can be supervised. The shapes are very colorful and easy to clean. Keeps the little one busy for hours without plopping them in front of a TV. Win Win for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: C. S. Rynearson

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality is not good some of them bent and won't stay straight on paper
customer_reviews.author: shahbaz mahmoodi

customer_reviews.title: Great gift and sturdy carrying case
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas and it was a hit. I LOVE that it has a carrying case, so many toys these days just come in a box and there is all these little pieces and eventually something gets lost. Not here this kit comes with a study carrying case to hold all stencils and some papers and writing utensils. Way to go, this was a great investment on my part.
customer_reviews.author: JMH

customer_reviews.title: Great kit! Sturdy carrying case. Lots of stencils.
customer_reviews.text: Very full kit with a fantastic carrying case to fit it all in, including paper. It's got everything you need to start drawing and coloring! My four year old loves that she can draw horses, butterflies, princesses, sea creatures and so much more. This is a great kit for the tiny human artist in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna W

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for a girl...or anyone
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband's 5 year old cousin and I had to use all my will power not to start using it first! Once we gave it to her, she went straight up to her room and started stenciling. She LOVE it!!! Might put a set on my Amazon list as well ;)
customer_reviews.author: Ivana K.

customer_reviews.title: What a nice set! Dozens of different stencils (each sheet is ...
customer_reviews.text: What a nice set! Dozens of different stencils (each sheet is themed) colored pencils and paper all tucked neatly into a handy carry case. Bought it for my 7 years granddaughter and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: kathy from MI

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Stencils are sturdy and nice - but they should be sized a bit bigger. Some of the stencils are so small you can't fit a pencil in to trace the shape. By the time you trace the shape, it doesn't look quite right. The pencil lead kept splitting and breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Tueller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These stencils are great! They bring out creativity and are great for both a boy or a girl. I bought them for my daughter but she and my son share. My son is not even 3 and he looks at the ABC and number one reciting his abcs. I love them, wish there was a little bit more paper and stencils but great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Workman

customer_reviews.title: It's quiet time for Mom
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the kids (3) attention for a long amount of time..it can stand up to a 3 year old who is nickname is BAM BAM. That's a small miracle. Will be used often > good for wide range of ages~ 3 thru 12. It gives me (rare) time to myself when the kids are using it. Need more things like this one. Happy with product> enough supplies to keep kids from fighting! Yipeeee! ☆☆☆☆☆
customer_reviews.author: Noni

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a Christmas gift. The stencils are thick and sturdy. The case the stencils and everything else included fit nicely in the case. This gift has inspired my child to draw and be more creative. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jordipoo

customer_reviews.title: So many great stencils!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE!! SO GIFTABLE! It comes with a multicolored option pen that makes tracing those tight spaces so much easier. I got these for my daughter, but honestly can't wait to use them on cards, invitations, etc. They have do many options to make anything just a tad now personal. Stencils are sturdy and the case is very reliable. The color pencils sharpen nicely, but the lead breaks easily. Would NOT discourage me from buying these as a gift in the future. Worth it!! :)
customer_reviews.author: shannon n.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of stencils! Very entertaining! Great as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sons 6th birthday and he is loving it, my daughter joined in on the fun soon after we opened it. Kept my kids busy for a couple hours! It comes with paper, colored pencils, sharpener and a multi-colored pen. Really great little set! I’d buy it as a gift also!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great for Boys & Girls
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for my son - he has a few fine motor challenges and he LOVES these stencils. They are great for fine-motor development and for sharing with friends (he took them to a friend's house and they drew for quite a while using this kit). The price is so fair for everything that's included in this kit. Great quality and the tote that everything comes in is so sturdy and convenient. Plus the variety of stencils are great for boys and girls. So glad I found this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Bouchard

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I usually like to wait a little while before leaving a review, but my non verbal daughter was so excited about this set. She ripped into it as soon as I opened the box. It’s hard for me to find things she really enjoys, but this set is a real hit. Worth every penny to make my little angel happy
customer_reviews.author: Morgan R Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice QUALITY set!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money! My 6 year old LOVES it! Would make a great gift too. Very high quality, not flimsy at all. A nice set with lots of variety of stencil shapes. Comes with paper and pencils too and a really nice sturdy carrying case too.
customer_reviews.author: Oilshealthymama

customer_reviews.title: Many choices
customer_reviews.text: This stencil kit has so many different designs that it works for both my kids. Boy and girl!! They love making cards and adding there favorite stencil to it. The carrying case is great as well. This is also a great set for gifting.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping. I love all the choices that you get with this product. That being said they are not as sturdy as if have hoped so if you have kids 3 and under I possibly wouldn't but them. Overall a great product I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Usnwest84

customer_reviews.title: Terrific stencils
customer_reviews.text: The stencil set is terrific! We have two grandchildren and everyday they love tracing their favorite things. Now, they color them after tracing. We can easily spend hours using them. It was greatest gift I could have given them. It also helps with their creativity. I give these stencils an A+
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stencils are awesome.
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love this set except the colored pencils. The color pencils broke every time they used them and they were hard to sharpen. We ended up using them up in the first week and got good colored pencils to use
customer_reviews.author: Tarbear73

customer_reviews.title: Some Cut outs not wide enough
customer_reviews.text: The pictures look awesome on the stencil, but when you put pencil too them, most cut outs are too little and didn't leave enough room to make some legs, tails, or ears. Just a line. They are fine for my 3 yr. old granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: TamGar

customer_reviews.title: Great Stencil Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my granddaughter and she just loves them, and so do her brother & sister. I was pleasantly surprised that they are larger than expected and of heavy gauge plastic so they are easy to use and seem very durable. I was also impressed with all the different topics they covered. I would recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: Chris F.

customer_reviews.title: Great set of stencils!
customer_reviews.text: This set of 16 stencils is great! It also comes with colored pencils, paper and a cardboard case. I am very pleased with the variety of stencils!!! My kids and I will get lots of use from these!
customer_reviews.author: teacher

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: purchased this for a 6 year old. She loves it and uses it every day. Her mom loves it too because every thing packs up nicely into its case.
customer_reviews.author: weezie

customer_reviews.title: Valuable gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: I got this as gift for a 5year old boy, I was little hesitant to buy as a gift. But I bought this to try it it was amazing gift ever I have given. Birthday boy mother messaged me and thanked me for this creative gift and he absolutely loved it and spending most of his time in creating with the stencil. I absolutely recommend as a gift for kids for sure
customer_reviews.author: Abhilaksha Balaji

customer_reviews.title: Great activity kit except for the poor quality colored pencils
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice product with the exception of the colored pencils. They break easy and are poor quality. My granddaughters keep asking me to buy some different colored pencils because the ones in the activity kit are “cheap” and keep breaking. They love everything else about the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for girls and boys!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful variety of stencils for both boys and girls' interests. I love that it includes a case to keep everything together compactly so pieces don't get misplaced. Includes paper with a preprinted border and coloring pencils. Would purchase this again for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Well we got this for my niece for her birthday and it showed up overnight cool but it's ripped now we have to fix it because returning it is always more trouble and time then it's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago ortegon

customer_reviews.title: Great set!! Could use just a little improvement
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful set! The stencils are great quality and there is a TON of them!!! Our child is obsessed with them! Would love to see what else you have to sell! Some of the stencils have such thin spacing in them you can't always fit even the finest pointed pencil in them, but I'd still buy again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: JBaj

customer_reviews.title: Nice collection, buy your own pencil set
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit for the kids. There are a lot of different stencils and I like the storage case. The paper is cute. The pencils are on the cheap side for such an expensive kit, but they can be replaced. I wish there were more gender neutral stencils though.
customer_reviews.author: Designer MomTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Thick sturdy plastic. The best quality stencils I have seen as they are very thick and durable. Very important for toddler hands. And it comes with a great caring case.
customer_reviews.author: Mills

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. For the price I was afraid it was going to be flimsy. The stencils are very nice quality and the case is quite sturdy. I was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Laura D

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: bought this for the grandkids during our "shelter in place" time during Covid-19. loved the carrying case it came in. lots of fun shapes to trace. imagination in action.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Images too narrow for pencils.
customer_reviews.text: The stencil is too narrow to fit the pencil tips. The images are distorted because they are not cut and designed to be stencils. Wonderful selection of images, pencils, and paper otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: My kids enjoy drawing and crafting with these stencils. The price was comparable to other products I looked at. They seem study and I believe they will hold up to rough child’s play.
customer_reviews.author: BLun

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic stencil set
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves the stencil kit and is making fabulous pictures. He is learning about the color spectrum, arrangement, spacing, and is having a wonderful time with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Fromer

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great addition to our arts and crafts selection. Well made. My daughter and son enjoyed playing with them for hours. Would be a great gift idea as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne Bates

customer_reviews.title: It’s a very good for a little girl to expand her creativity
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old daughter is so excited to receive this art and craft set. It’s a very good for a little girl to expand her creativity. She just follows the stencils to have different shapes, animals, and numbers. She spent hours in this fun drawing instead of watching TV or IPad most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Ca$h M4n

customer_reviews.title: These stencils are good quality and could be used with colored pencils
customer_reviews.text: I have not yet given this to my grandkids, but I expect a really positive response. These stencils are good quality and could be used with colored pencils, crayons, markers or water paints. This kit looks like it will be slot of fun for all the kids, especially when they are together on vacations . There is no need for batteries and the kit can occupy many kids at the same time. I think it’s definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice varieties of stencils
customer_reviews.text: We love the varieties of stencils included. It comes with a nice carrying box so we can easily store it. The kids love making arts out of these stencils.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Y Chen

customer_reviews.title: Great price for so many stencils
customer_reviews.text: This is great. It came with the most stencils I've seen since Kindergarten! Our daughter loves it and it was a great christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Cierra Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy stencils bring hours of fun for coloring friendly kids
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 4 year old daughter on her birthday. She loves to draw, and has not stopped since I gave her this! The included stencils are very sturdy, and have held up so far. She enjoys the colored pencils and the stationary paper that came with it. All of her siblings gather around the table to use the stencils as well, when she pulls it out. A very popular item in our house!
customer_reviews.author: A. Double Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: What a great stencil set!! 54 pieces, wow! I’m always skeptical of quality but these are made great and not to mention a ton of fun! We will get a ton of use out of these. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: A Great Art Project starter for children and parents.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! Its use is intuitively obvious. Loved by both kids & parents. I stopped counting after 60 families to take a short lunch break. The Santa Margarita Water District held their annual Water Celebration on May 20 and invited "Goin Native Therapeutic Gardens" GNTG to host a booth. GNTG is a non profit in San Juan Capistrano.
customer_reviews.author: thePekingman

customer_reviews.title: Home schoolers must buy
customer_reviews.text: We are a family that home schools are toddlers right now. This is perfect for some of out lesson plan. They are easy use for small hands.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen saam

customer_reviews.title: This item  enhanced our granddaughters creatiivety
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our six-year-old granddaughter who likes to draw and color and create pictures she really enjoyed the stencils and incorporated them into her original artwork. Well constructed although some stencils were a little small for the use of the pencil
customer_reviews.author: Wes Lane

customer_reviews.title: What a great idea!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love stencils, drawing, coloring and painting. Not necessarily in that order. But the kids will especially love this set on a day when they just want to sit and color, paint or draw.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Stencils
customer_reviews.text: So many options! Great for both a boy and a girl. Stencils have some bend but are still sturdy. Impressed with the amount of selection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice carrying case. Lots of stencils to choose from
customer_reviews.text: I bought the stencils as a Christmas gift for my 7 year old granddaughter she loved them. They are very sturdy and durable. Many different stencils to choose from. They come in a nice carrying case. I think there are stickers and other craft items in the set. My granddaughter loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Stencils
customer_reviews.text: The grandchildren really enjoy these and there is a large variety for them to enjoy. I would buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 3 year old grandson. He loved it! It has a lot in it so they can create all day.
customer_reviews.author: SharingIsCaring💜

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!! Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product!!! There are so many cool stencils to choose from and the carrying case is very sturdy. My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: my grandchildren from 2 to eight LOVE this. good quality
customer_reviews.text: my grandchildren from 2 to eight LOVE this. good quality. you do need to buy some colored pencils though it makes it easier for some of the designs. great case for storage.
customer_reviews.author: kw

customer_reviews.title: Its a hit!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson and son-in-law had a great time drawing with this during the Texas stay at home order!
customer_reviews.author: M. Dalessandro

customer_reviews.title: Great stencil set
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! My daughter is getting to the age where she can start tracing things and she’s having so much fun with it! I love the Varieties of the different kinds of shapes and things to draw! The colored pencils were a nice addition too
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Duplantier

customer_reviews.title: Weak handle
customer_reviews.text: Carry handle was broken when it arrived. Was a gift, so there was no time to replace. Handle was removed completely.
customer_reviews.author: Dima

customer_reviews.title: Good assortment. Good value.
customer_reviews.text: These are much better quality than we usually find. and the cutouts are better choices in general.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Wike

customer_reviews.title: Love the whole thing
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for my daughter and well it is so neat that I may have stolen them from her.!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids - won’t bend!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these!! They’re thick, not the thin flimsy plastic, so even kids’ wild crazy movements won’t bed the stencils.
customer_reviews.author: Azjadi

customer_reviews.title: exactly what was represented.
customer_reviews.text: this is a Christmas present for grandchild. am sure this will be used a lot because it is easy and plenty of different uses. great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Venango

customer_reviews.title: Great stencil kit !!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year granddaughter loved this stencil kit . Such a great assortment of stencil designs to choose from and a great little case to carry everything in!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Stencils Galore
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the coolest things I have bought for my kiddo. So many options for my little artsit!
customer_reviews.author: WINMommy

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughters love them.
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughters love coloring, drawing and painting so these get quite the workout.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as my son saw me open the package he was so excited! The packaging is very sturdy and it's in a "to go" type staging so easy, organized pick up. It came with alot of paper and tracers like dinosaurs...space theme. This will be an awesome gift for someone who loves to draw!!! I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, sturdy and super fun!
customer_reviews.text: This set is incredible! It’s study and has so many options. The carrying case is big enough to fit a notebook and markers so you can easily travel with it. We have gotten so much use out of it already. It made for a perfect 8 yo girls birthday present... but her 10 yo brother, Mom and Dad love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best stencils.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves using these stencils to help her draw. She spends hours using stencils for her drawings.
customer_reviews.author: Katen Robinson

customer_reviews.title: good for us
customer_reviews.text: saw other reviews talking about the lack of sturdiness of the stencils however we have been plenty happy. I bought this for the birthday of my daughter turning 5. We have been very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: ... gift but I think my niece is going to love it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift but I think my niece is going to love it... she’s very artistic!
customer_reviews.author: David L. Wegman

customer_reviews.title: poor quality pencils
customer_reviews.text: The pencil fillings were broken and I had to sharpen them until they became about half their initial size. Stencils are OK but some crevices are too small to fit any type of writing instrument and the intended figure can't be outlined.
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Great activity for kids. Nice sturdy case. Stencils are good variety. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lori A Young

customer_reviews.title: Great stencils
customer_reviews.text: These stencils are great! Gave them to a six year-old for Christmas. She is still drawing with them. Wish the box they are stored in was a bit sturdier. Stencils are heavy duty. My niece can hand them down to her children.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Fun, good  quality
customer_reviews.text: Five year old loved this gift, I would recommend tis

customer_reviews.title: Good value for amount of items
customer_reviews.text: Great variety of stencils. Seems sturdy. Paper is fairly thick. Good value!
customer_reviews.author: Taina A.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product that can be used for years. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Pflugh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kit!
customer_reviews.text: You won't be disappointed with this purchase. This produce offers a fun and extensive variety of stencils, plus it includes the paper and pencils. I highly recommend this product. I've purchased it twice as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my kiddo! IM actually really amazed at the quality and how much you get! The carry case is a great bonus too!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: She absolutely loved it and now her 2 older sisters (8 and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old niece. She absolutely loved it and now her 2 older sisters (8 and 9) keep wanting to use it too. Her mum said they took it on a long flight and it was perfect for keep them busy.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Well packaged activity for children
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yo grandson just loved these, as did his parents. The kit kept him busy!
customer_reviews.author: deirdre z.

customer_reviews.title: Great Variety At A Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Great Value with so many designs. Took up free style coloring as a stress reliever. Love the choices. Definitely worth it. Additional note : added picture as gives detail where made and materials used.
customer_reviews.author: V. Mayes

customer_reviews.title: These stencils are hard plastic. They are not flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I have been looking for ! Hard plastic and nice variety of shapes to hold my 4 and 6 year old's interest.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Mikita

customer_reviews.title: Stencil Kit
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. Looks very nice and well thought out kit. Plenty of things to occupy the mind's creativity and then some.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a car drive .
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sturdy to carry it around in car . Keeps the kids engaged for hours . Very good to gift for kids who love to draw . Love the way it keeps the screen time away .
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's birthday and she absolutely loves it
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for the little artist in your home.
customer_reviews.text: Have always loved stencils. Purchased these as a gift and my grandaughter. She could not wait to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Super Gift
customer_reviews.text: The grandchild loves them. They are also mom's friend on long trips.

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for girls
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift to my niece she loves it

product_meta.title: Drawing Stencils Set for Kids (54-Piece) - Perfect Creativity Kit & Travel Activity - Arts and Crafts for Girls & Boys with Over 300 Shapes - Educational Toys Age 3+ Ideal Kids Gifts
product_meta.description:
Make Learning FUN - damental! 

Our big stencil art kit, with over 300+ templates, makes the educated process a creative process when you draw and color with your toddler or kid at home.

Preschool and kindergarten-aged children will love learning how to recognize basic shapes with our portable drawing stencils kit.

Whether you are teaching young children the alphabet or working on geometry with older childrens, our stencil sets are good holiday, bday, Christmas or Birthday gifts for girls and boys! The best part? It makes learning fun all year (3-5, 5-7, 7-12 yo)!

Unleash your child’s creative potential and teach them valuable life skills.

Our cool stencil kit has everything you need for your childs and carrying case will help your child keep their entire set together: 
✓ 16 washable stencils 
✓ 25 sheets of paper 
✓ 10 colored pencils 
✓ 1 sharpener 
✓ BONUS 3-color pen 

Make activities for travel simple too - just grab the case and go!

Our reusable plastic templates come with designs that boy and girl will love: Xmas; Dinosaur; Ships; Space; Circus; Flowers & Butterflies; Fashion & Princess; Wild Jungle & Farm Animals; Numbers & Letters, Geometric Shape and more!

Customer Satisfaction Is Our TOP Priority.

Buying only from seller - Creative ELF you can be assured that it is Original new product. And we are happy to offer you a 30-Day Money-Back Guarantee if you are not satisfied with your purchase. We value all our customers!

Click “Add to Cart” Now and promote your 3 4 5 6 7 8 yearold child’s creativity with great educational toy everyone will love!
feature_bullets: ALL IN ONE FULL ART SET - includes large stencils, paper, colored pencils, sharpener, pen and case. Best boys & girls toys and Gift for Kids
PROMOTE CREATIVITY - spark your child’s imagination and enhance their artistic with our kids crafts stencil kit. Amazing crafts for kids ages 4-8, 8-12
CARRY & GO - our handy carrying case holds all of your kids art supplies. Be ready to go with your art and craft toys for any long trips: car, plane, or train
FUN FOR ALL AGES - big stencils for kids provide hours of fun for children of all ages. Awesome сoloring art & crafts for girls and boys!
SAFETY STANDARDS - our kids arts and crafts set is made from non-toxic, BPA-free plastic. Meets Toy Safety Standards for toddlers and kids 4 year old and older
